sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SM_PRIVGRP WHERE PRIVGRP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #srch_privgrp_name#, '%') AND USE_YN LIKE CONCAT('%', #srch_use_yn#, '%')

SELECT A.* FROM( SELECT PRIVGRP_SN, PRIVGRP_NAME, PRIVGRP_DESC, IFNULL(PRIORT, '0') AS PRIORT, IF(USE_YN='Y', '사용', '미사용') AS USE_YN, UPDT_DT, UPDUSR_SN, @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS RNUM FROM SM_PRIVGRP, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R WHERE PRIVGRP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #srch_privgrp_name#, '%')
AND USE_YN LIKE CONCAT('%', #srch_use_yn#, '%')
ORDER BY PRIORT ASC ) A
WHERE A.RNUM >= #START_ROW# AND A.RNUM <= #END_ROW#

SELECT A.PRIVGRP_SN, A.PRIVGRP_NAME, A.PRIVGRP_DESC, A.PRIORT, A.USE_YN, A.UPDT_DT, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM SM_USER WHERE USER_SN = A.UPDUSR_SN) AS UPDUSR_SN
FROM SM_PRIVGRP A WHERE A.PRIVGRP_SN = #privgrp_sn#
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO SM_PRIVGRP (PRIVGRP_NAME, PRIVGRP_DESC, PRIORT, USE_YN, UPDT_DT, UPDUSR_SN ) VALUES (#privgrp_name#, #privgrp_desc#, #priort#, #use_yn#, SYSDATE() + 0, #updusr_sn# )
SELECT COUNT(*) + 1 FROM SM_PRIVGRP
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SM_PRIVGRP SET PRIVGRP_NAME = #privgrp_name#, PRIVGRP_DESC = #privgrp_desc#, PRIORT = #priort#, USE_YN = #use_yn#, UPDT_DT = SYSDATE() + 0, UPDUSR_SN = #updusr_sn# WHERE PRIVGRP_SN = #privgrp_sn#
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE SM_PRIVGRP SET USE_YN = "N", UPDT_DT = SYSDATE() + 0, UPDUSR_SN = #updusr_sn# WHERE PRIVGRP_SN = #privgrp_sn#
sqlMap.select: SELECT count(*) FROM IS_MENU A LEFT JOIN (SELECT SM_PRIVGRP.PRIVGRP_SN, SM_PRIVGRP.PRIVGRP_NAME, SM_PRIVGRP.PRIVGRP_DESC, SM_PRIVGRP.PRIORT, SM_PRIVGRP.USE_YN, SM_PRIVGRP_PRIV.PRIV_SN, SM_PRIVGRP_PRIV.MENU_ID, SM_PRIVGRP_PRIV.INQIRE_YN, SM_PRIVGRP_PRIV.WRITE_YN FROM SM_PRIVGRP, SM_PRIVGRP_PRIV WHERE SM_PRIVGRP.PRIVGRP_SN = #privgrp_sn# AND SM_PRIVGRP_PRIV.PRIVGRP_SN = #privgrp_sn#) B ON A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID

SELECT A.MENU_ID, A.MENU_NAME, A.UP_MENU_ID, A.PROGRM_URL, A.SORT_ORDER, B.PRIVGRP_SN, B.PRIVGRP_NAME, B.PRIVGRP_DESC, B.PRIORT, B.USE_YN, B.PRIV_SN, IFNULL(B.INQIRE_YN, 'N') AS INQIRE_YN, IFNULL(B.WRITE_YN, 'N') AS WRITE_YN FROM IS_MENU A LEFT JOIN (SELECT SM_PRIVGRP.PRIVGRP_SN, SM_PRIVGRP.PRIVGRP_NAME, SM_PRIVGRP.PRIVGRP_DESC, SM_PRIVGRP.PRIORT, SM_PRIVGRP.USE_YN, SM_PRIVGRP_PRIV.PRIV_SN, SM_PRIVGRP_PRIV.MENU_ID, SM_PRIVGRP_PRIV.INQIRE_YN, SM_PRIVGRP_PRIV.WRITE_YN FROM SM_PRIVGRP, SM_PRIVGRP_PRIV WHERE SM_PRIVGRP.PRIVGRP_SN = #privgrp_sn# AND SM_PRIVGRP_PRIV.PRIVGRP_SN = #privgrp_sn#) B ON A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID ORDER BY UP_MENU_ID ASC, SORT_ORDER ASC
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO SM_PRIVGRP_PRIV (PRIVGRP_SN, PRIV_SN, MENU_ID, UPDT_DT, UPDUSR_SN, INQIRE_YN, WRITE_YN ) VALUES (#privgrpSn#, #privSn#, #menuId#, SYSDATE() + 0, #updusr_sn#, #inqireYn#, #writeYn# )
SELECT COUNT(*) + 1 FROM SM_PRIVGRP_PRIV
